item.description: Saturday night, November 21st, you can catch us over at the Bear & Grill, located at 385 Boston Post Rd. (Rt. 1) in Orange, CT, their phone: (203) 298-0742. It's only been a few weeks, but we're looking forward to returning to the Bear & Grill, a fine eatery and watering hole on the Post Road...featuring a rustic Adirondack hunting lodge decor, along with hearty, stick to your ribs, grill dishes! We've always had a lot of fun at our shows here...fun, casual party vibe here!!! Showtime starts at 9:30, if any of our past shows are any indication, reservations maybe in order as we usually pack this room too!!! For more info, visit their website at: http://www.thebearand...

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Bernadette's @ Bear and Grill
